content.value:
We have 4 rooms at your disposal, all of them with a stunning view of the surroundings, balconies and ample windows. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Also at your disposal are shared bathrooms with hot water 24 hours a day, a fully equipped kitchen free to use at any time, common recreational areas where you can meet other guests,play or simple relax, Wi-Fi,cable TV, free Colombian coffee, an internet equipped PC for anytime use, security lockers and luggage storage.

Featuring city views and free WiFi, Sayta Hostal features accommodation attractively set in Bogot√°, within a short distance of Quevedo's Jet, Luis Angel Arango Library and Bolivar Square.
El Campin Stadium is 7 km from Sayta Hostal, while Corferias International Exhibition Center is 7 km from the property.

description.description: In 2012 SAYTA HOSTAL opens its doors at a brand new location to enhance our guests' experience. Our house is a beautiful construction, years of history make it part of the architectonic patrimony of the city of Bogot (Our house has been restored, however it's structural integrity remains).
